activities: TeleTracking provides implementation services and license and service and support of Capacity Management Solutions™ products known as BedTracking®, PreAdmitTracking® with the electronic bedboard®, TransportTracking™, ServiceTracking™, ProcedureTracking™, TeleTracking Transfer Center™ and TeleTracking RTLS (hereinafter referred to individually or collectively as “System” depending on the context in which the term is used).  TeleTracking is currently negotiating System contracts (License Agreement) with certain of the NHS Foundation Trusts in the United Kingdom.  The License Agreement requires TeleTracking to provide technical System service and support.  In so doing, TeleTracking may have access to personal information by way of an HL7 interface between a System and to a Trust's Admitting, Discharge and Transfer (ADT) system.
personaldata: Patient data may be viewed.  The patient data is not processed manually or otherwise.
recoursemech: For complaints that cannot be resolved between TeleTracking and the complainant, TeleTracking agrees to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
